[22] te jarāyabhihatā na sobhare, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] sā jarāya upakūlitā viya, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] te jarāya khaṇḍitā cāsitā {pītakā (sī0)}, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] sā jarāya bhaggā {bhañjitā (?)} vināmitā, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] tā jarāya yatha pāṭalibbalitā {yathā pāṭalippalitā (sī0 syā0 ka0)}, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] so valīhi sukhumāhi otato, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..
[21] ``nāgabhogasadisopamā ubho, sobhare su ūrū pure mama.
[22] te jarāya yathā veḷunāḷiyo, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..

[22] te jarāya phuṭitā valīmatā, saccavādivacanaṃ anaññathā..
[21] ```samaṇā'ti ^a^T0.0479^ea^ bhoti supi {bhoti tvaṃ sayasi (sī0), bhoti maṃ vipassi (syā0)}, `samaṇā'ti pabujjhasi {paṭibujjhasi (sī0 syā0)}.
[22] samaṇāneva {samaṇānameva (sī0 syā0)} kittesi, samaṇī nūna {samaṇī nu (ka0)} bhavissasi..
[22] rohinī dāni pucchāmi, kena te samaṇā piyā..
[22] āsaṃsukā sādukāmā, kena te samaṇā piyā''..
[22] rāgaṃ dosaṃ pajahanti, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] sabbaṃ pāpaṃ pahīnesaṃ, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] manokammaṃ suci nesaṃ, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] puṇṇā sukkāna dhammānaṃ {sukkehi dhammehi (sī0 syā0 aṭṭha0)}, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] atthaṃ dhammañca desenti, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] ekaggacittā satimanto, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] dukkhassantaṃ pajānanti, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] anapekkhāva gacchanti, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[21] ``na ^a^P0.0151^ea^ tesaṃ koṭṭhe openti, na kumbhiṃ na khaḷopiyaṃ.
[21] ``na te hiraññaṃ gaṇhanti, na suvaṇṇaṃ na rūpiyaṃ.
[22] paccuppannena yāpenti, tena me samaṇā piyā..
[22] aññamaññaṃ piyāyanti {pihayanti (ka0)}, tena me samaṇā piyā''..
[21] ``atthāya vata no bhoti, kule jātāsi rohinī.
[22] saddhā buddhe ca dhamme ca, saṅghe ca tibbagāravā..
[22] sace bhāyasi dukkhassa, sace te dukkhamappiyaṃ..
[22] samādiyāhi sīlāni, taṃ te atthāya hehiti''..
[22] samādiyāmi sīlāni, taṃ me atthāya hehiti..
[22] tevijjo sottiyo camhi, vedagū camhi nhātako''..
[21] ``mā ^a^V0.0336^ea^ me kujjhi mahāvīra, mā me kujjhi mahāmuni.
[22] na hi kodhaparetassa, suddhi atthi kuto tapo..
[21] ``ehi kāḷa nivattassu, bhuñja kāme yathā pure.
[22] ahañca te vasīkatā, ye ca me santi ñātakā''..
[21] ``etto ^a^M0.0413^ea^ cāpe catubbhāgaṃ, yathā bhāsasi tvañca me.
[22] tayi rattassa posassa, uḷāraṃ vata taṃ siyā''..
[22] taṃ ^a^T0.0482^ea^ maṃ rūpavatiṃ santiṃ, kassa ohāya gacchasi''..
[22] āharimena rūpena, na maṃ tvaṃ bādhayissasi''..
[22] taṃ maṃ puttavatiṃ santiṃ, kassa ohāya gacchasi''..
[21] ``jahanti putte sappaññā, tato ñātī tato dhanaṃ.
[21] ``idāni te imaṃ puttaṃ, daṇḍena churikāya vā.
[22] bhūmiyaṃ vā nisumbhissaṃ {nisumbheyyaṃ (sī0)}, puttasokā na gacchasi''..
[21] ``handa kho dāni bhaddante, kuhiṃ kāḷa gamissasi.
[21] ``eso hi bhagavā buddho, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati.
[22] tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gacchaṃ, so me satthā bhavissati''..
[21] ``etaṃ kho labbhamamhehi, yathā bhāsasi tvañca me.
[27] vandanaṃ dāni te vajjaṃ, lokanāthaṃ anuttaraṃ.
[21] tato ^a^M0.0414^ea^ ca kāḷo pakkāmi, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati.
[22] so addasāsi sambuddhaṃ, desentaṃ amataṃ padaṃ..
[21] tassa pādāni vanditvā, katvāna naṃ {katvānahaṃ (sī0)} padakkhiṇaṃ.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] tuvaṃ divā ca ratto ca, atīva paritappasi..
[22] vāseṭṭhi kena vaṇṇena, na bāḷhaṃ paritappasi''..
[22] na ^a^T0.0484^ea^ socāmi na rodāmi, na cāpi paritappayiṃ''..
